page.title: 16MY HOUSE
page.content: {GARDEN-}My back garden has got a little patch of grass. Then some steps and then another patch of grass.In the left hand bottom corner is a rockery and at the top of the garden is another rockery and if you climb onto the rockery and go through the trees you come to my den.My den has a bit of old carpet and some old Christmas lights and some other things.The front garden is smaller and has a trailer in front of it.{house {upstairs_}you walk up the stairs and go straight into my room.Then you come out and turn left into my mum and dads room.Then you come out and go straight ahead and go into the bathroom.You come out and turn right into my brothers room.{Downstairs_}you come in the front door and turn right and your in the lounge.You come out and walk straight down and you turn right and
